name: AttributeDynamicLookup
desc: A type to support dynamic member lookup of attributes and containers.

items.name: subscript<T>(T.Type) -> T
items.desc: Returns an attributed string key that corresponds to a specified type.

items.name: subscript<T>(dynamicMember: KeyPath<AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes, T>) -> T
items.desc: Returns the attributed string key for a specified Foundation key path.

items.name: subscript<T>(dynamicMember: KeyPath<AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.NumberFormatAttributes, T>) -> T
items.desc: Returns the attributed string key for a specified Foundation number format key path.

items.name: subscript<T>(dynamicMember: KeyPath<AttributeScopes.SwiftUIAttributes, T>) -> T
items.desc: Returns the attributed string key for a specified SwiftUI key path.

items.name: subscript<T>(dynamicMember: KeyPath<AttributeScopes.UIKitAttributes, T>) -> T
items.desc: Returns the attributed string key for a specified UIKit key path.

items.name: subscript<T>(dynamicMember: KeyPath<AttributeScopes.AppKitAttributes, T>) -> T
items.desc: Returns the attributed string key for a specified AppKit key path.
